definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: The current president Chen Jinwei schools, senior secondary school teachers.
sentences.chinese: 學校現任校長陳瑾瑋，中學高級教師。

sentences.english: Good afternoon, my name is Wade.
sentences.chinese: 大家下午好我是趙俊瑋。

sentences.english: The teacher, according to Kang, is a vice dean of a department of BNU.

sentences.english: Wilber seems to have a deep connection with Korea.
sentences.chinese: 瑋柏似乎和韓國有着密切的關係。

sentences.english: Thank you Weiqi for sharing with us photos and video.
sentences.chinese: 感謝瑋琪與大家分享照片與錄像。

definition: camel/white horse with a black mane (archaic)
bow case or scabbard/to hide/military strategy
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
